maya/beastmayaplugin/src/cameratarget.cpp

#include "cameratarget.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h"


#include <maya/MRenderView.h>

namespace beastmaya {

CameraTarget::CameraTarget(bool cameraRender) : m_cameraRender(cameraRender), Target(MObject::kNullObj) {

}

void CameraTarget::importTarget() {
        BeastFramebufferPtr frameBuffer = getBeastTarget().getFrameBuffer(*m_pass, 0);

        int numChannels;
        int width, height;
        std::vector<unsigned char> pixels;

        frameBuffer->getChannelCount(numChannels);
        frameBuffer->getResolution(width, height);

        pixels.resize(width*4);

        // Buffers are mirrored so do one row at a time
        MRenderView::startRender(width, height);
        for (int y = 0; y < height; y++) {

                frameBuffer->readRegionLDR(0, y, width, y+1, ILB_CS_RGB, 2.2f, pixels);

                std::vector<RV_PIXEL> rvPixels;
                unsigned int j=0;
                for (size_t i=0; i<width; i++) {
                        RV_PIXEL tempP;
                        tempP.r = (float)pixels[j++];
                        tempP.g = (float)pixels[j++];
                        tempP.b = (float)pixels[j++];
                        tempP.a = 255.0f;
                        rvPixels.push_back(tempP);
                }

                MRenderView::updatePixels(0, width-1, height-y-1, height-y-1, &rvPixels[0], false);
        }
        MRenderView::endRender();
}

void CameraTarget::exportTarget(BeastJob& job) {
        BeastTargetPtr cameraTarget = job.createCameraTarget(L"cameraTarget", *m_camera, 800, 600, m_cameraRender); // FIXME
        m_pass = job.createFullShadingPass(L"cameraFullShadingPass");
        cameraTarget->addPass(*m_pass);
        setBeastTarget(cameraTarget);
}

BeastCameraPtr& CameraTarget::getBeastCamera() {
        return m_camera;
}

void CameraTarget::setBeastCamera(BeastCameraPtr& camera) {
        m_camera = camera;
}

}
